addon.description: The next-episode.net service for Kodi allows to add your movies and TV episodes from media library to your inventory on next-episode.net. The service also monitors video playback and updates 'watched' status of your movies and episodes on next-episode.net.[CR][B]Note:[/B] The addon works only with Kodi medialibrary!
addon.name: Next Episode (next-episode.net)
addon.news:
1.2.2:
- Replaced deprecated logging level.

1.2.1:
- Fixed library sync when TMDB is used as a TV shows scraper.
- Fixed UI dialogs in Kodi 19 "Matrix".
addon.summary: A service for Next Episode (next-episode.net) website.
